119a7('bum): 'das de ltar bdag gis chos skyon med pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na// byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos byon
119b1('bum): med pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis zug pa ma mchis / byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma
119b2('bum): mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
119b3('bum): de ltar bdag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi ga bcom ldan
119b4('bum): 'das dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming
119b5('bum): de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib
119b6('bum): pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag
119b7('bum): par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma
120a1('bum): mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ zug
120a2('bum): pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom
120a3('bum): ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par
120a4('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma
120a5('bum): mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos
120a6('bum): rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthongs/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang
120a7('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos
120b1('bum): rnams kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis pa thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming des mchis pas / de ltar na ming gnas pa ma mchis thug pa
120b2('bum): ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan das bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes
120b3('bum): su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang
120b4('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ zug pas
120b5('bum): mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
120b6('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma mchis pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma
120b7('bum): mthong ste/ de la ci zhes bgyi zhe na pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis te/ 'dus ma bgyis ni 'das pa ma lags so// ma 'ongs pa ma lags so// da ltar byung ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
121a1('bum): bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ 'dus ma bgyis pa po de yang gang zhe na/ gang la skye ba ma mchis/ gnas
121a2('bum): pa ma mchis/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
121a3('bum): bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub
121a4('bum): sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma med cing
121a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa sa dmigs yang dag par
121a6('bum): rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
121a7('bum): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang phyogs kyi
121b1('bum): 'jig can gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos sa dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i
121b2('bum): 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
121b3('bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
121b4('bum): ngo// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos
121b5('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho nub kyi phyogs
121b6('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems
121b7('bum): dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi rtse/
122a1('bum): ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel
122a2('bum): ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das pa dag gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
122a3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom
122a4('bum): ldan 'das bdag gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
122a5('bum): bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
122a6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
122a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig brtags par bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan
122b1('bum): 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchan de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thub pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis dge 'dun gyi ming de yang gnas pas mchis/ drug pasas cis/ snron gyis bang/
122b2('bum): ba ma mchis/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ bug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa
122b3('bum): mchis thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
122b4('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ zug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma ma
122b5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ zug pa ma mchis// byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// / shes rab tu
122b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu gsum pa// bcom ldan 'das gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar bgyi ba dang / chos su gdags pa/
122b7('bum): de yang gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ kye 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sla 'am/ dr-i 'am/
123a1('bum): ro 'bra/ reg gas/ chos sas// mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi
123a2('bum): par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
123a3('bum): pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lnga'i
123a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam me'i
123a5('bum): khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam nam mkha'i khams samarnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/
123a6('bum): skye mched drug gam reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'amalen pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
123a7('bum): pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/
123b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid das/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid spang ba nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don ngas pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang//
123b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thogs dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam ka rang gi mtshan
123b3('bum): nyid spong ba nyid dam mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
123b4('bum): rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam
123b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'am 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par
123b6('bum): thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa
123b7('bum): rnams sam ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/
124a1('bum): byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rjechen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis brjod dum mchis pacu/ chos su gdags pa tsam dubyas so//
124a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na mi la ma zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgyum zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgra brnyan nus bgyi
124a3('bum): ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// mig yor zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// smig rgyu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chu blanas
124a4('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na nam
124a5('bum): mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// /
124a6('bum): me zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis
124a7('bum): so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos nyid ces
124b1('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi dbyings zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi gnas nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod dus
124b2('bum): mchis so// chos skyon med pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol du
124b3('bum): byin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ba
124b4('bum): ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming
124b5('bum): ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma
124b6('bum): mchis so// ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// shes rab ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rnam par grol ba zhes brgya
124b7('bum): ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjed du ma mchis so// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gangagis
125a1('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis/
125a2('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//
125a3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i
125a4('bum): ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma
125a5('bum): mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni grang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang /
125a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang dge ba bam/ mi dge ba 'am/
125a7('bum): kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag ma mchis pa 'am/ zhi ba 'am/
125b1('bum): ma zhi ba'am ga dben pa 'am/ mi dben pa 'as/ dngos po 'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis pang brjod du ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don kyi dbang dris bum po
125b2('bum): ba'i slad du/ de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma mthong bzhin du 'di ltaste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes
125b3('bum): bkri bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gis 'gyod par 'gyur ro zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de slar ming don gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mdzes te/
125b4('bum): de ci'i slang du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ zug pa ma mchis/ byin gyi brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
125b5('bum): chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod de/ rnam pa 'di dag dang / tshul 'di dag dang / mtshan ma 'di dag gis bstan pa'i tshe/ sems zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur
125b6('bum): zhing 'gyod pa ma mchis lag mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rtogs
125b7('bum): bar bgyi ste ka gnas pa zhes bgyi ba ni gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
126a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ nges gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du shes la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed
126a2('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
126a3('bum): des lce la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sgra la gnas par mi
126a4('bum): bgyi'o// des dri la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ro la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des reg la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi rnam par shes
126a5('bum): pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par
126a6('bum): mi bgyi'o// des lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/
126a7('bum): des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des snga'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus kyi 'dus
126b1('bum): reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg
126b2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
126b3('bum): des lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/
126b4('bum): des chu'i khabs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des me'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rlung gi khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
126b5('bum): des rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par
126b6('bum): mi bgyi'o// des ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi ba gyi'o//
126b7('bum): des sreng ba la gnas par mi brtse'o// des len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des na shil gnas par
127a1('bum): mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs
127a2('bum): ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba tshor bas stong ste// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa
127a3('bum): de yang tshor ba ma lags tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/ 'du shes kyi stong
127a4('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed 'du
127a5('bum): byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed ma lagasa'adu byed las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa
127a6('bum): nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong steg rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa
127a7('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
127b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i che ba des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du shes la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas
127b2('bum): par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de yang 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste/ mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig ma lags/
127b3('bum): mig las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba rnabs stong ste/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba ma lags/ rna ba las
127b4('bum): gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna snas stong ste/ sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna ma lags/ snga las gud na yang stong
127b5('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang snga'o// lde lces stong ste/ lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce ma lags/ lce las gud na yang song pa nyid ma mchis
127b6('bum): telce nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus lus kyis stong sde/ lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus ma lags/ lus las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
127b7('bum): lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid yid kyis stong ste/ yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid ma lags/ yid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
128a1('bum): yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las
128a2('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra sgras stong ste/ sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sgra ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang
128a3('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri dris stong ste/ dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dri ma lags/ dri las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis/
128a4('bum): dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro ros stong ste/ ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ro ma lags/ ro las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid
128a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg reg gis stong ste/ reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang reg ma lags/ reg las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid
128a6('bum): kyang reg go// chos chos kyis stong ste/ chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags chos las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang
128a7('bum): chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ mig gi rnam par
128b1('bum): shes pa las gung na yang spong ba nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang spong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// na ba'i rnams par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes
128b2('bum): pas stong ste/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam
128b3('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags
128b4('bum): pa de yang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma lags sna'i rnam par shes pa las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par
128b5('bum): shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas spong ste/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma lags/ lce'i rnam par
128b6('bum): shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam
128b7('bum): bar shes pas stong ste/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
129a1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas song ste
129a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes
129a3('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig
129a4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o//
129a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na
129a6('bum): yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ sna'i
129a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong
129b1('bum): ba nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lnga'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lha'i 'dus te reg pa ma
129b2('bum): lags lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus
129b3('bum): reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang
129b4('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong sre
129b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus
129b6('bum): reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ mig gi
129b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang
130a1('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna
130a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
130a3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa
130a4('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
130a5('bum): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i
130a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
130a7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
130b1('bum): tshor ba las sung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sgra'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stod pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lha'i 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis dor ba'o// lus ci 'dus te ga pa
130b2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas spong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma
130b3('bum): lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus
130b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang
130b5('bum): lags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
130b6('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis spong ste/ sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sa'i kham
130b7('bum): ma lags sa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ chu'i khams
131a1('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chu'i khams ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chu'i khabs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chu'i
131a2('bum): khams so// me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ste/ me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang me'i khams ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ me'i khams
131a3('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rlung gi khams ma lags/ rlung gi khams
131a4('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ nam mkha'i khams
131a5('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang nam mkha'i khams ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang
131a6('bum): nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams
131a7('bum): ma lags rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so//
131b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ma rig pas song ste/ ma rig pa'i spong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ma rig pa ma lags/ ma rig pa las grang na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyi
131b2('bum): kyang spong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed ma lags/ 'du byed las gung na yang stong
131b3('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
131b4('bum): yang rnam par shes pa ma lags pa rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming
131b5('bum): dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ming dang gzugs ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid
131b6('bum): ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ste/ skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
131b7('bum): de yang skye mched drug ma lags/ skye mched drug las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa reg pas/
132a1('bum): stong ste/ reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang reg pa ma lags/ reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid
132a2('bum): kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba tshor bas stong ste tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang spong ba nyid/
132a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa sred pas stong ste/ sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sred pa ma lags/ sred pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang
132a4('bum): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa len pas stong ste/ len pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang len pa ma lags/ len pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te//
132a5('bum): len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa srid pas stong ste/ srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang srid pa ma lags/ srid pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
132a6('bum): te/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba skye bas stong ste/ skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang skye ba ma lags/ skye ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma
132a7('bum): mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi rga shis stong ste/ rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rga shi ma lags/ rga shi las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma
132b1('bum): mchis te rga shi nyid kyang song pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir ba spyod
132b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// skye mam
132b3('bum): drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o// reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// sred pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// srid pa la
132b4('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
132b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe nabacom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
132b6('bum): stong ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lag pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i
132b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
133a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul/
133a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
133a3('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
133a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
133a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
133a6('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a7('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi
133b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 'phyin pas spong sa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ btsor 'grus kyipa ma/
133b2('bum): du phyin pa las gung na yang spong ba nyid ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
133b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar/
133b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags bsam
133b5('bum): gtadan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ga'
133b6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di
133b7('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa shes rab
134a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
134a2('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshepha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
134a3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
134a4('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma la/
134a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcom ldan
134a6('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
134a7('bum): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
134b1('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis spong ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags/ yang dag
134b2('bum): par spong ba rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub
134b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
134b4('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
134b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi stong ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa
134b6('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
134b7('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
135a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po lnga gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis
135a2('bum): stong ste/ dbang po rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dbang po rnams ma lags dbang po rnams la sa gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dbang po rnams kyang stong pa nyidag/ stong
135a3('bum): pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dbang po rnams la
135a4('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spobs lnga la gnas par mi bgyi ste/
135a5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang stobs rnams ma lags/ stobs rnam
135a6('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
135a7('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab tu
135b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi man lag
135b2('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
135b3('bum): te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
135b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
135b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho'aphags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar lam lam gyis stong ste
135b6('bum): lam gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lam ma lags lam las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lam yang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// bcom ldan 'das rnam
135b7('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom
136a1('bum): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi sde/ de ci'i
136a2('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'phag
136a3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
136a4('bum): bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe'aphags pa'i bden pa rnams la
136a5('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan bzhi la gnas par mi
136a6('bum): bgyi ste de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam
136a7('bum): gtan rnams ma lags bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom
136b1('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
136b2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
136b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong skye/ tshad med pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshad med pa rnams ma lagasatshad med pa rnams las gung na yang
136b4('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshad med pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
136b5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
136b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i
136b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzug
137a1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
137a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
137a3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
137a4('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams
137a5('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa rnams ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
137a6('bum): ternam par thar pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol/
137a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
137b1('bum): ba'i na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i stoms par 'jug pa dgra la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
137b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems
137b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams cad
137b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab tu
137b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ba mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
137b6('bum): bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
137b7('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ste/
138a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
138a2('bum): dang smon pa med pa ma lags rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang //
138a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
138a4('bum): nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
138a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par mi bgyi ste de ci'i slad
138a6('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid
138a7('bum): gang lags pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
138b1('bum): rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
138b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
138b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ mi 'jig pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis
138b4('bum): stong ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa
138b5('bum): rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
138b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
138b7('bum): che na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
139a1('bum): kyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
139a2('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/
139a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang
139a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
139a5('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / snying rje
139a6('bum): chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang byams pa chen po ma lags/ de yang snying rje chen po ma lags byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
139a7('bum): byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po yang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139b1('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshebyams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher pos
139b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshesangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na pa bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
139b3('bum): 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma
139b4('bum): lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
139b5('bum): 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
139b6('bum): rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la
139b7('bum): gnas par mi bgyi ste yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ cig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par
140a1('bum): mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yi ge
140a2('bum): rnams ma lagasayi ge rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang
140a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
140a4('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnam
140a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa
140a6('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
140a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
140b1('bum): pa rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste de ci'i srang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di sar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting 'dzin can rnams kyis rlon
140b2('bum): sde ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams
140b3('bum): kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
140b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi
140b5('bum): thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lag
140b6('bum): ba de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom
140b7('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
141a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/
141a2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma las/
141a3('bum): gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid / stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
141a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / tshor ba
141a5('bum): mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lan
141a6('bum): pa de yang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid ma lags tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom
141a7('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha
141b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis spong /
141b2('bum): ste/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid
141b3('bum): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du
141b4('bum): shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// des shes
141b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyis
141b6('bum): stong ste/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags// 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyang
141b7('bum): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed
142a1('bum): mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad
142a2('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par
142a3('bum): shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mi
142a4('bum): rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ge zhes bgyi bar gnas
142a5('bum): par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas
142a6('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
142a7('bum): lags pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa
142b1('bum): nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal /
142b2('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bcin/ de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'ang
142b3('bum): ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste ga tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las
142b4('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
142b5('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug
142b6('bum): bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes sdug
142b7('bum): bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid
143a1('bum): kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ral/
143a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho ga 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste
143a3('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed sdug
143a4('bum): bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom
143a5('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab
143a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid nas/
143a7('bum): par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa sdug
143b1('bum): bsngal ba nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
143b2('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bkye bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzha
143b3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi 'gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
143b4('bum): don 'dra slar gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs
143b5('bum): bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te// gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
143b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba dang /
143b7('bum): med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba bdag med pa nyid tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
144a1('bum): gang lags pa de lang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid ma lags ka tshor ba bdag med pa nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyang snang pa nyid// spong ba nyid /
144a2('bum): kyang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar
144a3('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes bdag
144a4('bum): med pa nyid 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang /
144a5('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
144a6('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi ba
144a7('bum): gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed bdag med pa nyid 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
144b1('bum): yang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid las rung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang snang pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'angadu byed bdag mang btang ba/
144b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag med de zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shen
144b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid
144b4('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa bdag
144b5('bum): med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
144b6('bum): des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
144b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di
145a1('bum): sngar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs ni banyid las
145a2('bum): bud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
145a3('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// tshor ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par
145a4('bum): mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba zhi ba nyid tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba zhi ba nyid ma lags
145a5('bum): tshor ba zhi ba nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor bzhi pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
145a6('bum): bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
145a7('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes zhi ba nyid 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes zhi ba nyid ma
145b1('bum): lags 'du shes ni banyid las zung na yang spong ba nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyang snang pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes zhi bzhid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam zangs des na/ zung sa
145b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rje
145b3('bum): 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed zhi ba nyid 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
145b4('bum): pa de yang 'du byed zhi ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
145b5('bum): des nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
145b6('bum): rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyis spong ste/ rnam par shes pa
145b7('bum): zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid ma lags pa rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/
146a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
146a2('bum): par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sa gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi
146a3('bum): par gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong steg gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzug
146a4('bum): stong pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
146a5('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
146a6('bum): tshe tsher rab stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyid nor ba stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
146a7('bum): gang lags pa de yang tshor ba stong pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba stong pa nyid do//
146b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi
146b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes spong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes stong pa nyid 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 2dra
146b3('bum): shes stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid gastong pa nyid kyang
146b4('bum): 'du shes stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
146b5('bum): bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed stong pa
146b6('bum): kyis stong ste/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
146b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed spong
147a1('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyig// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa spong ngo zhes dartse bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srang du zhan/
147a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di sar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi spong ba nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa sa
147a3('bum): pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid do//
147a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chu/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par ma
147a5('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
147a6('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i srang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
147a7('bum): lags pa de yang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mtshan ma meng pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid gaslong
147b1('bum): pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ gzugs pan/
147b2('bum): ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan
147b3('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba mtshan pa med pa nyid ma lags/
147b4('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mtshan pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/
147b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
