201b3('bum): mams par 'jug pa dgra pa lags rnam par thar pa ga spong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i ma stong pa nyid dang / bachang samang pa dang / smon pa med pa
201b4('bum): ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgrom lags/ de bzhin gshegs
201b5('bum): ba'i spobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mo 'jigs pa ma lags ma so yang dag par rig pa rnams nas so yang dag par rig pa sa lags/ sang
201b6('bum): rjenang pa ra stong rjeche po sa lags/ sas rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad nisangs rgyas kyi rgas ma lags/ de dag na chos thung ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang sa lag so/
201b7('bum): bcom gra pas nges tshas thams cad mos sum gzung ba'i mang du/ gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tsho ba mas su ma 'dzin pa dang / 'du shes sangams mi 'dzin par
202a1('bum): 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su mi gzung ba'i srang du/ mig yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba yongs
202a2('bum): su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/
202a3('bum): gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sgra yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dri yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ro yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / reg yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang
202a4('bum): chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slang du mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin
202a5('bum): pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung
202a6('bum): ba'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su
202a7('bum): mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
202b1('bum): gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lnga'i 'dus te reg pa'i
202b2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams
202b3('bum): cang yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/ sa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chu'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / me'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rlung gi khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
202b4('bum): nam mkha'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du / ma rig pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed/
202b5('bum): yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye mched drug yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
202b6('bum): tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / len pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin
202b7('bum): ba dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slang du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
203a1('bum): yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
203a2('bum): yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
203a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / don dab pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus
203a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su
203a5('bum): mi 'dzin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong
203a6('bum): pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
203a7('bum): chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su mi
203b1('bum): 'dzin pa dang / dbang po rnams yongs su sa 'dod pa dang / slobs rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs sa ma 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yang lag btang bamam
203b2('bum): su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs sam gzung ba'i srad du / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su mi 'dzid pa dang / rang mang ba rnams
203b3('bum): yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
203b4('bum): dgu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang
203b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i srang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su mi
203b6('bum): 'dzin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma sa
203b7('bum): pa bco brgyang yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su
204a1('bum): mi 'dzid pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang byang chub yongs su mi 'dzid pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes
204a2('bum): pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ma nor ba de bani
204a3('bum): nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid las
204a4('bum): su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos sgon med pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
204a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang / shes rab kyi
204a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig bya/ ci'i phyir da/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidan pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par ni bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
204a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na shes sa kyi
204b1('bum): parab tu phyin pa la mi spyong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor pa 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang rnams med cing mi migs pa yi/ sang
204b2('bum): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phye stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
204b3('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
204b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid da/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
204b5('bum): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi
204b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi
204b7('bum): dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
205a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
205a2('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong
205a3('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so// 'du shes med cing mi dmigs so// 'du byed med cing
205a4('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
205a5('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa/
205a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
205a7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mig med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba med cing mi dmigs so// sna med cing mi dmigs so// /
205b1('bum): mI med cing mi dmigs so// lus med cing mi dmigs so// yid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang spong pa nyid dang / bye stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / spong pa
205b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med/
205b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtsham nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
205b4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// sgra med cing mi dmigs so// dri med cing mi dmis
205b5('bum): so// ro med cing mi dmigs so// reg mang cing mi dmigs so// chos med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
205b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
205b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
206a1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
206a2('bum): med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par
206a3('bum): shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
206a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
206a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
206a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so// rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs
206a7('bum): so/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so//
206b1('bum): tsheng nga lda pa shAr dwa ti'i budang song pa nyid dang / chu spong pa nyid dang / byi na stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong ba nyid dang / chen pa stong panyid dang / dod das pa stong panying dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyi dang /
206b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa spyong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong /
206b3('bum): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
206b4('bum): kyi phyir/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
206b5('bum): tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te
206b6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
206b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
207a1('bum): dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po/
207a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sa'i khams med cing mi dmigs so// chu'i khams med cing mi dmigs so// me'i khams med
207a3('bum): cing mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams med cing mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang
207a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
207a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
207a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ma rig pa med
207a7('bum): cing mi dmigs so// 'du byed med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// skye mched drug med cing mi dmigs so// reg pa med
207b1('bum): cing mi dmigs so// tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so// sred pa med cing mi dmigs so// len pa med cing mi dmigs so// srid pa med cing mi dmigs so// skye ba med cing mi dmigs so// rga shi med cing
207b2('bum): mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
207b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
207b4('bum): nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
207b5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so//
207b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
207b7('bum): dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
208a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang // rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
208a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
208a3('bum): kyi phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams med cing mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// dbang po rnams med cing
208a4('bum): mi dmigs so// stobs rnams med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med cing mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
208a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
208a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad rtsong
208a7('bum): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
208b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bded pa bzhi med cing sa dmigs so// khams btad dpas med cing mi dmigs so// chang med pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'ag pa rnams mang
208b2('bum): mi dmigs so// brnam par thar pa brgyad med cing mi dmigs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mdzan
208b3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med cing mi dmigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams med cing mi dmigs so// gzudus kyi sgo rnams med
208b4('bum): cing mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med cing mi dmigs so// mi 'jigs pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med cing
208b5('bum): mi dmigs so// snying rje chen po med cing mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang phyi song
208b6('bum): pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
208b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang
209a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
209a2('bum): kyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so// dgra bcom
209a3('bum): pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// rang byang chub med cing mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so
209a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
209a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang
209a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
209a7('bum): dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid med cing mi
209b1('bum): dmigs so// chos nyid med cing mi dmigs so// chos kyi dbyings med cing mi dmigs so// chos kyi gnas nyid med cing mi dmigs so// chos skyo med pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// yang ngag
209b2('bum): pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi spong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang
209b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba meng pa stong pa'id
209b4('bum): dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
209b5('bum): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang med cing mi dmigs so// phyir mi 'ong ba yang med cing mi dmigs
209b6('bum): so// dgra bcom pa yang med cing mi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' yang med cing mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs
209b7('bum): so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi
210a1('bum): dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid
210a2('bum): stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ don dam/
210a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
210a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med/
210a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmim/
210a6('bum): so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid med/
210a7('bum): cing mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
210b1('bum): ming migs pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su mang gi
210b2('bum): phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so//
210b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/ sems
210b4('bum): zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa meng la/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa/
210b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
210b6('bum): gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni
210b7('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du shes ni
211a1('bum): 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
211a2('bum): 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes
211a3('bum): pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang
211a4('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
211a5('bum): so// rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna ni sna'i rang bzhin dang
211a6('bum): bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce ni lce'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
211a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
211b1('bum): rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji la ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ling de yid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ yang ga
211b2('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shU ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
211b3('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
211b4('bum): dri ni dri'i rang bzhin dang bral ba sa/ de byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji sa ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// don ro'i ring bzhid dang bral ba rtse/
211b5('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// reb ni reg gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
211b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
211b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang
212a1('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba'i
212a2('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
212a3('bum): shes so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
212a4('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i rnam par she pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
212a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
212a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems/
212a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg/
212b1('bum): ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni na ba'i/
212b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji la ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// snga'i 'dus
212b3('bum): te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
212b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
212b5('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
212b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
212b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg
213a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
213a2('bum): shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
213a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
213a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
213a5('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
213a6('bum): gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa rjes/
213a7('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
213b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'i khams ni pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ dbyang chub mas
213b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
213b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// me'i khams ni me'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
213b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
213b5('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin
213b6('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam
213b7('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
214a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
214a2('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
214a3('bum): du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
214a4('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rgyu/
214a5('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i//
214a6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// reg pa ni rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
214a7('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bani/
214b1('bum): du rab tu shes so// sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba rtse/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
214b2('bum): len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sring pa ni srid
214b3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye ba ni skye ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba
214b4('bum): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sem
214b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
214b6('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
214b7('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i
215a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// brtson
215a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
215a3('bum): du rab tu shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
215a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
215a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/
215a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
215a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
215b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
215b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sa/
215b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
215b4('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
215b5('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus ma byas
215b6('bum): stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
215b7('bum): du rab tu shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
216a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byung
216a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
216a3('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid
216a4('bum): kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
216a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang gi
216a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
216a7('bum): du rab tu shes so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
216b1('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
216b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
216b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
216b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
216b5('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i rang bzhin dang
216b6('bum): bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang
216b7('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dbang po lnga ni dbang po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste//
217a1('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// stobs lnga ni stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral
217a2('bum): ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi
217a3('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
217a4('bum): pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
217a5('bum): shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
217a6('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bsam gtan bzhi ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang /
217a7('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad med pa bzhi ni tshad med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
217b1('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
217b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
217b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang banin
217b4('bum): rang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
217b5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
217b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
217b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
218a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
218a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin
218a3('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni mi 'jigs pa'i rang
218a4('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni so so yang
218a5('bum): dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// byams pa chen po ni
218a6('bum): byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// snying rje chen po ni snying
218a7('bum): rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
218b1('bum): 'dras pa bcwo brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
218b2('bum): shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
218b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshi ga yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
218b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa
218b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
218b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
218b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
219a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad
219a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
219a3('bum): bu de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma nor
219a4('bum): ba de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
219a5('bum): so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
219a6('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos nyid ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
219a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos
219b1('bum): kyi gnas nyid ni chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos
219b2('bum): skyon med pa nyid ni chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
219b3('bum): so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
219b4('bum): so/ de tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
219b5('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu brgyang pa/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni ji la bu/
219b6('bum): 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mig gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rngu ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ snga'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lho'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi
219b7('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sgra'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dri'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ro'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg gi rang bzhin
220a1('bum): ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang
220a2('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mig gi 'dus te/
220a3('bum): reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te
220a4('bum): reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin
220a5('bum): ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin na
220a6('bum): ji lta bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rgyu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ me'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dziHgu rlung gi
220a7('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam
220b1('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye madrung drug gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg pa'i rang bzhin na ji lta bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sred pa'i rang bzhi rdo rje
220b2('bum): lta bu/ len pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ srid pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rga shi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji la bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
220b3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ shes
220b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
220b5('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
220b6('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
220b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
221a1('bum): ni ji lta bu/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
221a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
221a3('bum): stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni
221a4('bum): ji lta bu/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi
221a5('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med bdag / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mngon par
221a6('bum): shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mi 'jigs pa/
221a7('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi/
221b1('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang ba zhin
221b2('bum): ni ji lta bu/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
221b3('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi
221b4('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos skyor med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang
221b5('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos
221b6('bum): po med pa'o// mig gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rna ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sna'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lce'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lus kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
221b7('bum): med pa'o// yid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sgra'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dri'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ro'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med
222a1('bum): pa'o// reg gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
222a2('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
222a3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang
222a4('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// /
222a5('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang /
222a6('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te re/
222a7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// me'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
222b1('bum): rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po meng pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa/
222b2('bum): 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
222b3('bum): reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sred pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// len pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// srid pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po
222b4('bum): med pa'o// skye ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rga shi'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos
222b5('bum): po med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po meng pa'o//
222b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med
222b7('bum): pa'o// stong pa nyid spong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyirang
223a1('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
223a2('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
223a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
223a4('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/
223a5('bum): dngos po med pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po meng pa'o// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang
223a6('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lam rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshad med pa rnams kyi rang
223a7('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam/
223b1('bum): kyirang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ting nge 'dzin
223b2('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni
223b3('bum): dngos po med pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po meng pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi
223b4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po mang pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// phyir mi 'ong
223b5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
223b6('bum): po med pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzhan ma yin pa
223b7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
224a1('bum): chos skyon med pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po mang pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar gzugs la/
224a2('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes
224a3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mig la mig gi rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba la rna ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna la sna'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce la lce'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus la lus kyi rang bzhin
224a4('bum): med pa dang / yid la yid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / sgra la sgra'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dril dri'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rol ro'i rang bzhin med pa/
224a5('bum): dang / reg la reg gi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos la chos kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i
224a6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin meng pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la snga'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus
224a7('bum): rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang
224b1('bum): bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rdza ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la snga'i 'dus te rag pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te rag pa la lnga'i 'dus te reg pa'i
224b2('bum): rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te rag pa la lus kyi 'dus te reb pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
224b3('bum): ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
224b4('bum): tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
224b5('bum): tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sa'i khams la sa'i khams
224b6('bum): kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / me'i khams la me'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams
224b7('bum): la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang ba'in med pa dang / 'du byangs 'du byed kyi lan
225a1('bum): med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched drug la skyemached drug gi rang bzhin med pa
225a2('bum): dang / reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / len pa la len pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / srid pa la srid pa'i rang
225a3('bum): bzhin med pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
225a4('bum): phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi
225a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bani/
225a6('bum): med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
225a7('bum): nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dus byas
225b1('bum): stong ba nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyirang
225b2('bum): bzhin med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa'i
225b3('bum): la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa
225b4('bum): dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa
225b5('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin
225b6('bum): med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin med
225b7('bum): pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la lam gyi rang
225b8('bum): 'phags pa'i
226a1('bum): bzhin med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshad med pa rnams
226a2('bum): la tshad med pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la rnam par thar
226a3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
226a4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
226a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bskul de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang
226a6('bum): bzhin med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang
226a7('bum): bzhin med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
226b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nying la dgra bcom pa nyid
226b2('bum): kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa
226b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
226b4('bum): nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhir med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi
226b5('bum): gnas kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o//
226b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do// tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// 'du shes la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid med do// 'du byed la
226b7('bum): 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mig la mig gi mtshan nyid med do// rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid med do// sna la sna'i mtshan
227a1('bum): nyid med do// lce la lce'i mtshan nyid med do// lus la lus kyi mtshar nyid med do// yid la yid kyi mtshad nyid med ngo // gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do// sgral
227a2('bum): sgra'i mtshan nyid med do// dri la dri'i mtshan nyid med do// ro la ro'i mtshan nyid med do// reg la reg gi mtshan nyid med do// chos la chos kyi mtshan nyid med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig
227a3('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lha'i
227a4('bum): rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i

227a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// yid kyi 'dus
227a7('bum): te rig pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
