227b5('bum): la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med //
227b6('bum): ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do// skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid med do// reg pa la reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// sred
227b7('bum): pa la sred pa'i mtshan nyid med do// len pa la len pa'i mtshan nyid med do// srid pa la srid pa'i mtshan nyid med do// skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid med do// rga shi la rga shi'i mtshan nyid med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol
228a1('bum): tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod

229b5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes
229b6('bum): ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba tshor bas spong ste/

233a5('bum): de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs
233a6('bum): so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan
233a7('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// gzugs med/
233b1('bum): ba'i sgoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa ma rnams par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ des skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmig so// rnam par bar pa btud rnam par rar ba rnams kyis stong sa// das rtsa
233b2('bum): ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang
233b3('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung
233b4('bum): ba yang mi dmigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye
233b5('bum): ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bzhin gshegs
233b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/
233b7('bum): 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// byams pa chen po byams po chen pos stong ste/
234a1('bum): de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa bco
234a2('bum): brkyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/
234a3('bum): de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// phyir mi
234a4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba
234a5('bum): yang mi dmigs so// rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba
234a6('bum): yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
234a7('bum): te'i bu de bzhid ying de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// ma nor ba de bzhin 'ad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skya ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so//
234b1('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nying gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyis sbyong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ de la sku ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi rigs so//
234b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// chos kyi gnas nyid chos kyi gnas nyid kyis stong ste/ de la sgru ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so//
234b3('bum): chos skyon meng pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmig/
234b4('bum): so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa de'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
234b5('bum): pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag/
234b6('bum): yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// zhe sdang dang ldan/
234b7('bum): ba'i sems mi skyed do// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lte ba dang ldan pa'i sa
235a1('bum): mi skyed do// de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / sgyu dang ga g.yo dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba dang ldan
235a2('bum): pa'i sems mi skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ khor zug rtag par rdzus/ skye bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs paranam yang ngan song rnams su
235a3('bum): skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par
235a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
235a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
235a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u lnga'o//
235a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu dgu pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
235b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du
235b2('bum): shes la spyod nga mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du byed la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
235b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs rtag ces bgyi ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheran po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
235b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

239b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
239b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
239b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas rna ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
239b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
240a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
240a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
240a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
240a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
240a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
240a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
240a7('bum): tsho/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
240b1('bum): mkhas pas snga mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
240b2('bum): sna bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas snga sdug bsngal
240b3('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna bdag ces bgyi
240b4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das bal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snga bdag med ces bgyi bar
240b5('bum): spyod na mtshad ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
240b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snam zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas
240b7('bum): debyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snga dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
241a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
241a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
241a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ongs gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
241a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
241a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
241a6('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mimatha
241a7('bum): pas lce bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce zhi zhes
241b1('bum): bgyi bar spyong ngamatsha pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lham zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan sa
241b2('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

241b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

241b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

242a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

243a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
243a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

243a6('bum): mkhas pas gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
243a7('bum): gzugs bdag med ces babyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs
243b1('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs ma 'i zhes bgyi bar spyong na

243b6('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhra pas smra bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

244a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sgra bdag ces bgyi bar spong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

244b1('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri bde zhes bgyi bar

245a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

245a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
245a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas ro bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
245b1('bum): rozhi zhes bgyi bar spod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rom ni zhes bgyi bar spyodan
245b2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// com
245b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mdzes pas ro mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te
245b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshar ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
245b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
245b6('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
245b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
246a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
246a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
246a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas reg zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
246a4('bum): reg ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg dben zhes bgyi
246a5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshamam
246a6('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
246a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
246b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bung
246b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chu/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
246b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
246b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
246b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa
246b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
246b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
247a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
247a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
247a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
247a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

251a6('bum): mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe

251b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
251b2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
251b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe khangs
251b4('bum): mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ bcwa

251b6('bum): mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
251b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
252a1('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
252a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
252a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
252a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
252a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem
252a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
252a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
252b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
252b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
252b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
252b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
252b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
252b6('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
252b7('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
253a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
253a2('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de//
253a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
253a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
253a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem
253a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
253b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa dbe na na gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
253b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
253b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshar ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
253b4('bum): pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i
253b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa
253b6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag
253b7('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med
254a1('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg
254a2('bum): pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes
254a3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
254a4('bum): na mtshad ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
254a5('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
254a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pa
254a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
254b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus de reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal ta byang chub sems dpa'
254b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
254b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem
254b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
254b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
254b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
254b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
255a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
255a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
255a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha
255a4('bum): pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid
255a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'du
255a6('bum): te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te
255a7('bum): reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus
255b1('bum): tereg pa ni zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te regag ma
255b2('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes
255b3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i hU~M/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi
255b4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer gyis
255b5('bum): tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus
255b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
255b7('bum): mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
256a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
256a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
256a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

256a6('bum): pa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes

256b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

257a2('bum): gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te

257a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
257a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

257b6('bum): pas sna'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
257b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

258a7('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag
258b1('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

258b3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
258b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
258b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
258b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtsham ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
259a1('bum): / dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
259a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
259a3('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
259a4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
259a5('bum): ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus
259a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs
259a7('bum): mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
259b1('bum): spyod pa'i cho thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
259b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
259b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nor brtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
259b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bsngo bar spyod na
259b6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ba
259b7('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
260a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
260a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
260a3('bum): bal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
260a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
260a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
260a6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
260a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
260b1('bum): mtshan ma la spod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams dag ces bgyi bar spyod nam nadas
260b2('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
260b3('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
260b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do//
260b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/
260b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
260b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
261a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
261a2('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
261a3('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
261a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
261a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
261a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
261a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo do// bcom
261b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod //
261b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
261b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do//
261b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
261b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
261b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
261b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la
262a1('bum): spyong ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar
262a2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar
262a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bde zhes
262a4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams
262a5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
262a6('bum): pas me'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
262a7('bum): mkhas pas me'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
262b1('bum): babs mi mkhas pas pa'i khams zhi zhes brtsi bar spong namatshanam la spyod / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga sa rab kyi ba rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa'i/
262b2('bum): yabs me mkhas pas me'i khams sa zhi zhes bgyi bar ltung ngamatshanas la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nan po shes rabakyi pa ral tu byin pa la spyod pa'i ngo
262b3('bum): labs se mkhas pas ma'i khams dpan nas batho bar spyod mamatshanas la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal dathung du ba mas dpa' sems dpa' na pogs sa ci pa rol tu phyi pa la nga ba
262b4('bum): 'bas smra sa khas pas me'i khams mi da rnas partse ba ngasacams la spyod/ ma ldas das pal byang dub sams dpa' mas pa' thogs pa par sbyi pa spod
262b5('bum): rlabs mi mangs pas rung gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol rgyan pas myod ba'i ni
262b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bgro bar spyong namacanas la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes gci par 'atu byang ba la spyod pa'in/
262b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
263a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa
263a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
263a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
263a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
263a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
263a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
263a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
263b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
263b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
263b3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
263b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
263b5('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
263b6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
263b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
264a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
264a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do//
264a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
264a4('bum): spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams cag ces bgyi bar
264a5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag
264a6('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i
264a7('bum): khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
264b1('bum): bas rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
264b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
264b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se
264b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se
264b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams ma ni zhes rtse bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
264b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ za bra mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
264b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar
265a1('bum): spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po sum cu gcig pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/
265a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
265a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rabs mi mkhas bas ma rig pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang ba sems
265a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
265a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thad mi mkhas pas ma rig pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pong nang
265a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshanas la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
265a7('bum): byin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ 'angs mamakhas pas ma rig pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod dmatsha ma lo spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyo
265b1('bum): ba ma thabs mamengs pas ma rig pa ni zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dul spyod pa'i rabapa
265b2('bum): mamakhas pas ma rig pa ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mangs
265b3('bum): bas ma rig pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi ma khas pas
265b4('bum): ma rig pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshebabs mi mkhas
265b5('bum): bas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
265b6('bum): mkhas pas 'du byed mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
265b7('bum): tshethabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed ba de zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma le spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'im
266a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das bal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
266a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du
266a3('bum): byed bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed zhi
266a4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
266a5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
266a6('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
266a7('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
266b1('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar
266b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar
266b3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes
266b4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa
266b5('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par
266b6('bum): shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam
266b7('bum): par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
267a1('bum): mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpan sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
267a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan pa ngas gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
267a3('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
267a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
267a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
267a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs bde zhes dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan pa ngas gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
267a7('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas
267b1('bum): zer po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'in/ thangs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs pangag ces dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das bral te byang chub
267b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mangs pas ming dang gi zugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bco
267b3('bum): ldan 'das gal 'a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// zangs ma mkhas pas ming dang gzugs so zhes 'gyi bar spyad na macad pa la spyod do//
267b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming rang gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bcom
267b5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs dang na zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
267b6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs mi dben zhes bgyis spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
267b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mangs pas skye mched drug rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
268a1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
268a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

268a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
268a5('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
268a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
268a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
268b1('bum): dba' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mangs pas skye mched drug dben nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gapa te byang chub sems dpa'
268b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs me mkhas pas skye mched drug mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod mamatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
268b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
268b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
268b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
268b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas pas reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
268b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
269a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
269a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pazhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
269a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
269a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
269a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
269a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
269a7('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar skyong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
269b1('bum): spyo pa'i tsha/ thabs ma mkhas pas tshor ba bde nas bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spang ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal ta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la
269b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
269b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
269b4('bum): ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
269b5('bum): ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor
269b6('bum): ba ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba dben zhes

270a1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred
270a2('bum): pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i r-i thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa mi rtag ces

270a4('bum): na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod da mtshan
270a5('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gel te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rmi/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
270a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das bral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
270a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sherab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ro thabs mi mkhas pas sreng bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
270b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rma thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal

270b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa mi ngan zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
270b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas len pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
270b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rmi/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
270b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa po spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal ti bya
270b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas lan pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
271a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
271a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

271a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas len pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
