271a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rma/ thabs mi mkhas pa pa len pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 'i spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
271a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyong ba'i rathabs mi mkhas pas srid partag ces dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan pas
271b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
271b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
271b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
271b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bdag ces bkyo bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
271b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
271b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
272a1('bum): phyin pal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa
272a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa mi dben zhes bkye bar spyod nA mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
272a3('bum): po shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
272a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
272a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zab sa mi mkhas pas skye ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
272a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
272a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
272b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
272b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye bzhi zhes ba kyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
272b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas skye ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
272b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o tshe/ zabs ma mekhas pas skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gyi
272b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
272b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa sarga shi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ji rol
272b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
273a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan sa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin
273a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
273a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rga shri bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtsharnam la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
273a4('bum): na shri bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi zhi zhes
273a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas na shim ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
273a6('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi dbe ma ches bgyi bar spyod na mtshan sa la spyod do/ bcom ldan
273a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab so mi mkhas pas na shi mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das phal te byang
273b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
273b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
273b3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbyi
273b4('bum): dor bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na
273b5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces
273b6('bum): bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol
273b7('bum): tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
274a1('bum): pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
274a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
274a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
274a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
274a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
274a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs ma mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
274a7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
274b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes
274b2('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul
274b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/
274b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
274b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
274b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs momi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa
274b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
275a1('bum): dal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar
275a2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pras bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag
275a3('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i
275a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi malda
275a5('bum): pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
275a6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis
275a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes sakyi
275b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sam pa 'dun
275b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
275b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
275b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
275b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
275b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
275b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zab mi mdzes pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
276a1('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
276a2('bum): tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
276a3('bum): pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
276a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
276a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
276a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
276a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mazhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshamam la spyod do//
276b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbem nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
276b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dbem zhes bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do//
276b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod do//
276b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
276b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
276b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes babyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
276b7('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
277a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces brgya
277a2('bum): par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar
277a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
277a4('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar
277a5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben nas bgyi bar
277a6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
277a7('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la
277b1('bum): spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshar bas
277b2('bum): spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs se mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pasdug bsngal zhes 'bri bar spyod domatshan ma la
277b3('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces gyi ba stod na ma ma la
277b4('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
277b5('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
277b6('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
277b7('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
278a1('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
278a2('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid nag ces bgyi bar
278a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
278a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
278a5('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang rtsong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
278a6('bum): spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
278a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
278b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zhabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

278b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
278b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byi stong pa nyid na ga ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

278b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

281b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyon pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid dben shes bami bar spyod na macan ma la yod do// bcom
281b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom
281b3('bum): ldan 'das gal 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid nag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
281b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid mi drug ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom
281b5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srid pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dab pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcog
281b6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// btso//
281b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
282a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid ba ba med ces bgyi ba
282a2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes gyi
282a3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor dam pa stong pa 'di ma'i zhes dbyi bar sdod na
282a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcor ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa 'di dben nas dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lasgo/
282a5('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smon pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa 'di mi dben zhes bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la smod do// /
282a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa dam po sum cu gnyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
282a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
282b1('bum): ro tu drin pa la rjod pa'i tshe/ drangs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas spong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spod namatshan mal spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das pal te byang chung sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po zhes rab tu
282b2('bum): pa rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi ma khas pas 'dus byas spong pa 'di bde zhes dbyi bar sgro na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can do shes gyi
282b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol
282b4('bum): bu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas spyod pa nyid bdag ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu gyi
282b5('bum): ba spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
282b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thangs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nying ni zhes dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
282b7('bum): spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa 'di ma mi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
283a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid dpe mazhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga' te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
283a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
283a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sde lnga dpa' chen po shes rab
283a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces babyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
283a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco ldan 'das gal te
283a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethangs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidi sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/
283a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mimakhas pas 'dus ma byas myong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma'i srungs
283b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas rjod pa'i lade ces bci bar spo napa dan 'arjod/
283b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ga' ngabyang chub sems dang 'a sems dang chen po sa narang tu mnor du byin pa larjod par rgya babs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas thong ba ni zhes 'byib spyong na mtsha sa la spyo
283b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ga' te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma'i zhes bgyi bar rdzo ma char pa'i spyong/
283b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa 'di dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
283b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mar spyod do//
283b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa spyod pa nyid rtag ces dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
283b7('bum): bco ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
284a1('bum): ma ldan 'das pal nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sa ma pa ga sbyin pa rjod pa / sa
284a2('bum): par gyud na mtshan ma ma spyod do// bcom ldaran 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a tshan po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la rjod pa'i che// babs mimamasapa mtham las 'das brjod pa
284a3('bum): drug bsngal zhes dbye bar slongs ma pa la spyod// bcos ldan 'das pal te byang chubasam sa dpa' mnga' ba' can gas rab kyi rnon tu zin pa la ston pa na// bas mi mngasangs mtha' las das
284a4('bum): baspong panyid 'dug ces 'phyo bar spyo na mtshan mo la sbyo'o// bcom ldan 'das gapa te byang chub sems dang bsems dpa' chen pogs ran kyi de'i tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ni mkhas pas mtha'adas
284a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid 'das med ces byi bar sgron mchen ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 'a rol tu phyin pa la rjod pa'i cha/ babs mim pas
284a6('bum): bas mnga' las 'das pa stong ba'i ni zhes 'gro bar spyo na mtshan ma la spyod pa// bcom ldan 'das gal ta byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab rdo'i rlom du phyin pa la spyod dadri mi/ zabs kyi
284a7('bum): mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa spong pa 'di mni nas 'gyi bar spo na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cim
284b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa spyod pa 'i dben nas kyi bar blod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gami te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi pa 'dzu
284b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid mi daden zhes dbye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rang ci ro tu phyi bal sbyor
284b3('bum): tshe thangs ni mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyidi rtag ces dbyi bar spyod na mtshan mal spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spros pa'i
284b4('bum): 'bas mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tham med pa spong ba nyid ni rtag ces dkyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mi
284b5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong ba'i bde zhes 'gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skrong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
284b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nying sdug bsngal zhes 'gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
284b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nying bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
285a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
285a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma medapa/ spong pa nyid ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
285a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
285a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyi dben zhes dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
285a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
285a6('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar
285a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces
285b1('bum): 'gro bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor
285b2('bum): ba med pa stong pa nying bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma
285b3('bum): mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa 'di sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
285b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces 'bri bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
285b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
285b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stod pa 'di ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
285b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa spong ba nyid ma zhi nas 'bye bar spyod namatshan ma la spyong ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
286a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethubs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa spong pa nyid dbem nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
286a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa spong pa 'di mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
286a3('bum): mal spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces babyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
286a4('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
286a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thangs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin spong ba 'di bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
286a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe zangs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa 'di sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mol spyod do//
286a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa 'di bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
286b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa 'ing bdag med ces 'byi bar spyod namatshamang la spyo/
286b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa 'di zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sa
286b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshar ma la sto
286b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa 'di dben zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyo
286b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa 'di mi den nas bgyi bar spyon mtshan ma la spyod /
286b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces dbyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do/
286b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
287a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde nas
287a2('bum): dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa 'di sdug bsngal zhes
287a3('bum): dbye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces ba
287a4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces
287a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das zhal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar
287a6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad spyod pa 'di ma zhi zhes
287a7('bum): bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa 'di dben zhes
287b1('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang ba mtshan nyidi stong pa nyid drug
287b2('bum): ces bgyi bar spong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thangs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan 'di stong pa nyid mi
287b3('bum): rtag ces bgyi ngor spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong
287b4('bum): pa nying bde nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi mkhas pas rang mi
287b5('bum): mtshan nyidi sdod pa 'di sgrub bsngal zhes gyi bar spyos mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zangs mi mkhas pas dang /
287b6('bum): gi mtshan nyid rjong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
287b7('bum): rang gi mtshan 'di stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
288a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 'di ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
288a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
288a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
288a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
288a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
288a6('bum): sal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmig pa sgom nyid mi rtag ces dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
288a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skrod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes dbyi bar spyod na mtshan me la spyod do// bcom ldanas
288b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes dbyi bar spyod nasams 'gro'o// com ldan 'das bas
288b2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa 'di bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

288b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa 'di dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

289a6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyor 'i tshe/ za mi mkhas
289a7('bum): pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thangs mi mkhas
289b1('bum): bas dngos po med pa stong ba 'dri zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs sems
289b2('bum): pas dngos po med pa stong pa 'di ma zhi zhes dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

289b6('bum): mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

290a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo cid stong pa nyid mo dber zhes bgyi bor spyod na
290b1('bum): macan pa la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs sti mabyas pas
290b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

290b5('bum): mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i jo bo
290b6('bum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
290b7('bum): mkhas pas dngos po meng pa'i nga bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' don pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa
291a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sebs
291a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga
291a3('bum): he byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom
291a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyon na mtshan ma la
291a5('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du ben gis bgyi bar spyod na
291a6('bum): mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar
291a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces
291b1('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
291b2('bum): rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa /
291b3('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
291b4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
291b5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa
291b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
291b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma pa spyod do// bcom ldan
292a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
292a3('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnam sa rtag ces bgyi bar
292a4('bum): sprod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams mi
292a5('bum): rtog ces bgyi bar spro don mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong
292a6('bum): ba rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
292a7('bum): pas yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
292b1('bum): tshethabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 'om/
292b2('bum): tu dran pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bkye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
292b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/
292b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams dpon zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
292b6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnam mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
292b7('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
293a1('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi
293a2('bum): rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
293a3('bum): pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
293a4('bum): mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
293a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
293a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
293a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
293b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma ni shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
293b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dpon zhes bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
293b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
293b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas dbang po rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
293b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams mi rtag rjes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
293b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
293b7('bum): do bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
294a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
294a2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
294a3('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
294a4('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
294a5('bum): der bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do//
294a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
294a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
294b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
294b2('bum): rmo thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyo na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
294b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
294b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
294b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma khi zhes bgyi bor spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
294b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan las rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che/
294b7('bum): rab kyi rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma rnams la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
296a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
296a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
296a3('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bgyi
296a4('bum): par spyod na mtshan mA spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
296a5('bum): brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
296a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smon pa'i
296a7('bum): tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
296b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyon pa'i tshe na thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
296b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
296b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na ma tshan pa la spyod do//
296b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dben las par spyod
296b5('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po sum cu gsum pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sa/
296b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs pa mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
296b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
297a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
297a2('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i
297a3('bum): bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
297a4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
297a5('bum): tshe rnga thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
297a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bkye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
297a7('bum): pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
297b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
297b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
297b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
297b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
297b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
297b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
297b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
298a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bdag med
298a2('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan
298a3('bum): rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam
298a4('bum): gtan rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bas
298a5('bum): gtan rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsapa
298a6('bum): gtan rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med
298a7('bum): pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa/
298b1('bum): rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chad
298b2('bum): med pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
298b3('bum): tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
298b4('bum): mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
298b5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
298b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
298b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod/
299a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
299a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tha ba mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spong na mtshan pa la spod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ba/
299a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i sdom par 'jug pa rnams rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
299a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnam mi nag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rlon
299a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho ba thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i sgom par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnyan
299a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i sdom par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bami bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
299a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyam par 'jug pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal/
299b1('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsheg thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la ldos
299b2('bum): ro bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa mamasadapa' na mi shes byabar byis spyo 'i rdo/ thab mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i sdom par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod kyi
299b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i stob par 'khrugs pa ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na
299b4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnam
299b5('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i sto
299b6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
299b7('bum): pas rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan po la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
300a1('bum): mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
300a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
300a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spridra na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
300a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
300a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
300a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan
300a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam pa thang pa rnams pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda/
300b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
300b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bkri bar spyod na mtshan mas/
300b3('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgun gces brgya
300b4('bum): bor spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom par
300b5('bum): 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
300b6('bum): mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dren po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mthab mi mkhas pa/
300b7('bum): mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
301a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyi gnas pa'i sdom par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
301a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga
301a3('bum): he byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
301a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu ma nI zhes bgyi bar spyod
301a5('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
301a6('bum): dgu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyi gan+d+ha
301a7('bum): pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
301b1('bum): mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' dpa' san
301b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo sgom nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi drug ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod
301b3('bum): ro/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
301b4('bum): ba med pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par
301b5('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
301b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhra pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
301b7('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bgyi
302a1('bum): par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par
302a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
302a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byeng
302a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bgyi bar
302a5('bum): spod na mtshan ma la spod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ga mtshan ma
302a6('bum): med pa dang / smon pa meng pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
302a7('bum): mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
302b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtags ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
302b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bkri ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 'phyi
302b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa

302b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhra sa mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sprid do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
302b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyo ma nam pa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
303a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
303a2('bum): he byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
303a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'dra
