303b5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// so
303b6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
303b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//
304a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bgyi bar
304a2('bum): spror na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes
304a3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces
304a4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med
304a5('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi
304a6('bum): zhes bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams sa
304a7('bum): zhi shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnam/
304b1('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan sa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzungs gi so ma/
304b2('bum): mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabapa mi mkhab pas de bzhin gshegs
304b3('bum): ba'i stobs bcu rtsag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de
304b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs btsu ma nag ces bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
304b5('bum): mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdo zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
304b6('bum): spyod pa'i cho ga thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pas spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
304b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po shes rab
305a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
305a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ad/
305a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
305a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa/
305a5('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dben zhes bgyi/
305a6('bum): par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spod//
305a7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi
305b1('bum): bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams bde
305b2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnam
305b3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas pa
305b4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mas
305b5('bum): bas mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
305b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
305b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
306a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
306a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
306a3('bum): semadapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
306a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi chugaces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem
306a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
306a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
306a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhab pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bal
306b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
306b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smyon pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma ni zhes babri bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/
306b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la smos
306b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spro'o//

306b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byams pa chen po mi nag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
306b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byams pa chen po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

307b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po nag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

308a2('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po dben zhes bgyi bar spyod

308a4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces
308a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres/
308a6('bum): pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs
308a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
308b1('bum): mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha la
308b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa pas
308b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
308b4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bgyi por spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do//
308b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spod
308b6('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa rtse
308b7('bum): brgyad dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs
309a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
309a2('bum): bam po sum cu bzhi pa// / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha
309a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bgyi bar spyod na dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
309a4('bum): dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
309a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
309a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pas ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ba
309a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang /
309b1('bum): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su ma 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su
309b2('bum): mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de tshor ba la mos shing
309b3('bum): 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
309b4('bum): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
309b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de 'du shes la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
309b6('bum): na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do//
309b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyi rlob na/ de 'du byed la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob
310a1('bum): pas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde

310a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye
310a4('bum): pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal tshon po las yod/

310a6('bum): 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bo dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang //

310b1('bum): rna ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rna bal mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / myangan dang /
310b2('bum): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa/
310b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 'o du phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ snal mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de snal mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sna mngon par 'du ba ba la spyod do/ de ni gru ba dang / rga ba
310b4('bum): dang dran pa dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do//

310b6('bum): de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar
310b7('bum): brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de lus la mos shing 'du shes te byin
311a1('bum): gyis rlob pas/ lus mngon par 'du bya ba la spyong de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /

311a6('bum): shIng 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga bo dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /

311b1('bum): rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbal mos shing 'du shes la byin pas rlob nas/ de sbrul mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sgyu mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nang /
311b2('bum): dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grel/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do//
311b3('bum): kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dril mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ re dri la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pasadri
311b4('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/

318a4('bum): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjed do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

324b1('bum): dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi

324b3('bum): med pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ tshad med pa bzhi mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang / 'tsho ba dang / mya ngan dang / smra snga
324b4('bum): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpan
324b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i sgom par 'jug pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
324b6('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
324b7('bum): 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grel sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su
325a1('bum): mi 'grol bar brjod do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po sum cu lnga pa// / gal 'byang
325a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par thar pa brgyad la mos
325a3('bum): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
325a4('bum): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
325a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
325a6('bum): pa dgu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pos/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang //
325a7('bum): myang ngan dang / smre sdug 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te/
325b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mos shing 'du
325b2('bum): shes te byin gyis rlob na de rnam par thar pa'i sgo spong ba nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang
325b3('bum): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// kal
325b4('bum): haM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa drug pa mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de mngon par shes pa rapra la mos shing
325b5('bum): 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ mngon par shes pa drug mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
325b6('bum): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
325b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes ci byin gyis rlob na/ de sha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sha'i mig mngon par 'du bya ba
326a1('bum): la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngag 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs

326a3('bum): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de lha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes he byin gyis rlob pas/ lha'i mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang
326a4('bum): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang

326b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de chos kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ chos kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/
326b2('bum): de ni skye ba dang / rke ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / bya ngan dang / lba sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen

326b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes 'byin gyis rlob pa/

327a1('bum): yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

327a7('bum): yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/

328b1('bum): bu napa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi spyod de/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / gzugs nag ces bya bar mi

338a3('bum): chos kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos kyi khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod
338a4('bum): chos kyi khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi spyod de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma la'i spyod cing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kham
338a5('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal
338a6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi
338a7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi myong zhes bya bar mi
338b1('bum): spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khabs smon
338b2('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
338b3('bum): mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sa'i khams la mi spyod de/ sa'i khams kyi mtshan ma lo mi spyod cing / sa'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams mi drug ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i
338b4('bum): khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams bdog med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i kham so zhi zhes bya
338b5('bum): bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams skyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod
338b6('bum): sa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar spyod/ sa'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sa'i
338b7('bum): khabs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / chu'i khams la mi spyod de/ chu'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing ga chu'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
339a1('bum): chu'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams bdag med ces bya bar
339a2('bum): mi spyod/ chu'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyodadachu'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi spodachu'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams mtshan
339a3('bum): ma yid ces bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams mtshan pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams dben
339a4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chu'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / me'i khams la mi spyod de/ me'i khams kyi mtshan pa la mi spyod cing / me'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor
339a5('bum): me'i khams mi chug ces bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams bdag med
339a6('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams mo zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams mi spong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ me'i khams

339a8('bum): pa dang

339b5('bum): la mi spyod de/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkho'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi
339b6('bum): spyodanam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams zhi zhes bya bar
339b7('bum): mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams skyong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar
340a1('bum): mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyodanam mkha'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams smon pa med ces bya
340a2('bum): bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi spyod de/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
340a3('bum): mtshan mo la mi spyod cing / rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bdo zhes bya bar mi

340b1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / ma rig pa la mi spyod du/ ma rig pa'i mtshan pa la mi spyod cing / ma rig pa chug ces bya bar mi spyod/ ma rig pa mi nag ces bya bar mi spyod ma rig pa bde zhes bya bar

340b3('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ma rig pa spong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ma rig pa mi spong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ma rig pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ma rig pa mtshan ma mod ces bya bar mi spyor
340b4('bum): mge btsun pa 'od cir bya ba'i spros marig bsngon pa med ces bya bar ma spyod/ ma pa ben zhes bya ba mi spyo/ ma rig pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spod pa dang / 'du byed lo mi spyod de/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing

341a1('bum): bar mi spyod/ 'du byed mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod de/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam par shes pa rtag

341b3('bum): pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ming dang gzugs dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ming dang gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / skye mched drug la mi spyod de/ skye mched drug gi mtshan ma la

344b4('bum): byin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ljon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i phyi
344b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
344b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag

345a1('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus

351b4('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dngos po med pa sgos nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi nag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi
351b5('bum): spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po song ba stong ba nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos
351b6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyodadangos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi
351b7('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi spong/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon
352a1('bum): pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med

352a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag

352b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi sdod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi spyod de/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing
353a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes

353a6('bum): bor mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod de/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /

354b4('bum): pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag

358a7('bum): med pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
358b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bzhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar
358b2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi stong zhes
358b3('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
358b4('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam pa ma pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar
358b5('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben
358b6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mngon par shes rnams la mi spyod de/ mngon
358b7('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnam par
359a1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag
359a2('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod
359a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnam mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon
359a4('bum): par shes pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon pararo she nas mi dben
359a5('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi chag ces
359a6('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
359a7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi
359b1('bum): spong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/
359b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi
359b3('bum): spyod de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan ma lo mi spyod cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde
359b4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor/ gzung
359b5('bum): kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams pa'i zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gsungs kyi sgo rnams myong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi rnyed
359b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi
359b7('bum): sgo rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
360a1('bum): la mi spyod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin
360a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi chug ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
360a3('bum): mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar mi sprod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
360a4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
360a5('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin
360a6('bum): gshegs pa'i sbubs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dpon zhes bya bar
360a7('bum): mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mi 'jig pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mi 'jig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mi 'jigs
360b1('bum): ba rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi chug ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi/
360b2('bum): spod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma'o zhes bya
360b3('bum): bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sgong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
360b4('bum): mtshan mamed ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi
360b5('bum): spyod mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / so so yang dag por rig pa rnams la mi spyod de/ so so yang dag par rig po rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / so so yang
360b6('bum): dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag
360b7('bum): par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag pang
361a1('bum): rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
361a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces
361a3('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
361a4('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / byabs pa chen po la mi spyod de/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing
361a5('bum): byams pa chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/
361a6('bum): byams pa chen po bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po bdag med ces bya b.ro mi spyod/ byams pa chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/
361a7('bum): byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po mtshan ma med ces bya bar
361b1('bum): mi spyod/ byams pa chen po smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byabs pa chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po mi dben nas
361b2('bum): bya bor mi spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la mi spyod de snying rje chen po'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
361b3('bum): snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po
361b4('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi stong zhes bya ba
361b5('bum): mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po smon pa med
361b6('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod de/ sangs
361b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar
362a1('bum): pi skyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug pacwa zhes pa ba mi spyod/ sangs
362a2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni zhes bya
362a3('bum): par mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
362a4('bum): pa bco brgyad mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma med ces bya
362a5('bum): bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa bcwo brgyad smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
362a6('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
362a7('bum): mkhas par shes par bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyapa bam po sum cu bdun pa// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang
362b1('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stor pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong ba
362b2('bum): nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshor ba med/ tshor ba las gu ra yang
362b3('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du shes pa yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'du shes par
362b4('bum): 'du shes las gud na yang sgom nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma yin/ stong pa
362b5('bum): nyid las gud na yang 'du byed med/ 'du byed las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang
362b6('bum): yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes po las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/
362b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i kyang stong pa nyid do// mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mig ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig med/ mig las gung na yang stong pa nyid med de/
363a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mig mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rna ba ma yin stong pa nyid las gung na yang rna ba med/ rna ba la
363a2('bum): gud na yang sdod pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sna ba yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ska med sna las
363a3('bum): gung na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang snga sna nyid kyang spong pa nyid do// lce'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lce ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang lce med lce las gung
363a4('bum): na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lus pa yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lus med/ lus las
363a5('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang yid
363a6('bum): med yid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa
363a7('bum): nyid las gud na yang gzugs med gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sgra'i stong pa nyid
363b1('bum): pa de spang shA ma 'i rtsod pa'id las sudun ya khed rgyulas bu na yang srung ma nyid me du rtsod panyid rnapa thong ba'is
363b2('bum): de'i slong ba nyid gang yin pa de yang dri ma yin stong pa nyid las gud na yang dri med dri las gu na yang stong pa nyid med de stong pa nyid bdu drinyi
363b3('bum): ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ro ma yin stong pa nyid las gung na yang ro med ro las gud na yang stod pa nyid med de stong pa
363b4('bum): stong pa nyid do//
363b5('bum): ro nyid kyang stong pa'id ngo // reg gi slong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rig pa yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang reg med rag las gung na
363b6('bum): nyid kyang ro//
363b7('bum): spong ba nyid kyang reg reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chos ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gungan
363b8('bum): yang stong pa nyid med de
363b9('bum): chos las gud na yang stong pa nyid medu de stong ba nyid kyang chos chos nyid kyang spong ba nyid do// mig gi khams kyi stong pa'i gang yin pa
363b10('bum): yang chos med
363b11('bum): mig gi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de stong pa nyid kyang mig gi khams
363b12('bum): de yang mig gi khams pa yin stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig gi khams med
364a1('bum): mig gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang
364a2('bum): gzugs kyi khams med/ gzugs kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi khams/ gzugs kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mig gi
364a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med
364a4('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// /
364a5('bum): rna ba'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rna ba'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rna ba'i khams med/ rna ba'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid
364a6('bum): kyang rna ba'i khams/ rna ba'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sgra'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sgra'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sgra'i khams med/
364a7('bum): sgra'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra'i khams sgra'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa
364b1('bum): de yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gung na yang stong pa nyid
364b2('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sna'i khams
364b3('bum): ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sna'i khams med/ sna'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i khams/ sna'i khams nyid kyang rtsong pa nyid do//
364b4('bum): dri'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dri'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dri'i khams med/ dri'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
364b5('bum): dri'i khams/ dri'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na
364b6('bum): yang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ sna'i rnam par shes
364b7('bum): ba'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lce'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lce'i khams med/ lce'i khams las gud na
365a1('bum): yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i khams lce'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// re'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ro'i khams ma
365a2('bum): yin stong pa nyid las gud na yang ro'i khams med/ ro'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ro'i khams/ ro'i khams nyid stong pa nyid do// lce'i rnam par
365a3('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
365a4('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin
365a5('bum): pa de yang lus kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lus kyi khams med/ lus kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi khams/ lus kyi khams
365a6('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// reg gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang reg gi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang reg gi khams med/ reg gi khams las gud na yang stong
365a7('bum): pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg gi khams/ reg gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa na
365b1('bum): khams pa yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
365b2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yid kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid
365b3('bum): las gud na yang yid kyi khams med/ yid kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi khams/ yid kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos kyi khams kyi stong
365b4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chos kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi khams med/ chos kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi khams
365b5('bum): chos kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ spong pa nyid las gud na yang yid kyi
365b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
365b7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sa'i khams med/ sa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/
366a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams sa'i khams nyid kyang rtsong pa nyid do// chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chu'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang
366a2('bum): chu'i khams med/ chu'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang me'i
366a3('bum): khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang me'i khams med/ me'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
366a4('bum): rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rlung gi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rlung gi khams med/ rlung gi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rlung
366a5('bum): gi khams/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang nam mkha'i khams med//
366a6('bum): nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang
366a7('bum): yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid
366b1('bum): kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ma rig pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ma rig pa
366b2('bum): med/ ma rig pa las gung na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma yin/ stong
366b3('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang 'du byed med/ 'du byed las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i stong panyi
366b4('bum): gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa
366b5('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ming dang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ming dang gzugs med de/ ming dang
366b6('bum): gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang skye mched
366b7('bum): drug ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang skye mched drug med/ skye mched drug las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa
367a1('bum): nyid do// reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang reg pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang reg pa med/ reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de
367a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang reg pa/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshor ba med/ tshor ba las gud
367a3('bum): na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sred pa ma yin/ stong pa nyidi las gud na yang sred pa med/
367a4('bum): med/ sred pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sred pa/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// len pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang len pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid
367a5('bum): las gud na yang len pa med/ len pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang len pa/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang
367a6('bum): srid pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang srid pa med/ srid pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sred pa/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye ba'i
367a7('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang skye ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang skyo ba med/ skye ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang skye ba/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa
367b1('bum): nyid do// rkang shi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rga shrI ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gudun yang rga shi med/ rga shI las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rga shi/
367b2('bum): rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
367b3('bum): phyin pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud ni yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
367b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
367b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid do//
367b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/ bzod pa'i pha
367b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
368a1('bum): bya bya/ phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang brtson 'grus kyi rol tu phyin pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las bung na lang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi ba/
368a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med bas

368b7('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas spong banyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'dus byas tho
369a1('bum): pa nyid ma yin// stong pa nyidadi las gud na yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid med/ 'dus byas stong pa nyidi las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ thong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa 'i

369a7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spong ba gang yin pa de yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med/ dor ba med

369b6('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mi dmigs

370b1('bum): kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ stong pa

370b3('bum): stong pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi

370b6('bum): stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang spobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang stobs rnams med/ stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong
370b7('bum): stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang chub kyi yan lag rnams med/
371a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'phags
371a2('bum): pa'i lam lhag brgyad pa'i rtsong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ 'phags

371a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/ 'phags pa'i bden pa

372a6('bum): na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ stong
372a7('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
372b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pade bzhin
